Madonna and a drag queen are bringing the “Celebration Tour” to Nashville this winter amid Tennessee’s new legislation against drag performers.

articles.title: 'Shazam!' Star Says 'It's A Struggle' To Get Paid His Worth In Hollywood - The Daily Wire
articles.description: “Shazam!” star Djimon Hounsou said “it’s a struggle” to get paid his worth in Hollywood even after being in the business for more than 30 years. In a recent interview with The Guardian, the 58-year-old said he’s “still struggling to try to make a dollar” whil…
